summary: Why do I have a Beard?
perception:
I like my beard.
It makes me feel wise.
I say my daughter asked me to grow it.
I look cooler.
reality:
I have a beard.
My beard is longer than many I have seen.
I can't eat soup like a lady.
opportunity:
Wash and condition my beard.
Trim it a bit so it doesn't look scraggly.
Make sure I do not get food in it.
I won't shave my beard.
